paper.title: Model Checking PA-Processes
paper.abstract: PA (Process algebra) is the name that has become common use to denote the algebra with a sequential and parallel operator (without communication), plus recursion. PA-processes subsume both Basic Parallel Processes (BPP) [Chr93] and context-free processes (BPA). They are a simple model for infinite state concurrent systems. We show that the model checking problem for the branching time temporal logic EF is decidable for PA-processes.
